intent_atoms.description: Extend the JSON export schema for issues to include a schema.version descriptor (v2) when parse issues are present so tolerant payload consumers can detect the richer schema while strict-mode exports remain unchanged.
The JSON exporter emits a schema.version field with value v2 whenever parse issues are present.
Strict-mode exports do not include the schema.version descriptor and remain unchanged.
Snapshot tests cover trees containing zero, single, and multiple parse issues to guard new schema fields and issue payload structure.
The schema.version field is only present when parse issues exist.
The JSON exporter implementation was updated in ISOInspectorKit/Export/JSONParseTreeExporter.swift to emit the schema.version descriptor.

functional_units.name: JSON Exporter Schema Version Descriptor
functional_units.description: Emits a schema.version field (v2) in the exported JSON when parse issues are present to indicate richer schema for tolerant consumers.

functional_units.name: Tolerant Issue Payload Structure
functional_units.description: Provides structured payload for zero, single, and multiple parse issues within the JSON export.

functional_units.name: Snapshot Coverage for Parse Issues
functional_units.description: Unit tests that snapshot the JSON output for trees with no, one, or many parse issues to validate schema fields and issue structure.

functional_units.name: Documentation Update for Tolerant Exports
functional_units.description: Updates the app manual to explain the new schema version and removes the task from the active list.
